response.overview: For its second year running, The Malaysia Animation Film Festival 2024 will spotlight homegrown animators with an exciting lineup of 2 movies - Homegrown Animated Shorts & Grimoire. MAFF presents an opportunity for audiences to enjoy a diverse range of animated works that reflect the unique voices and artistic prowess of Malaysiaâ€™s storytellers. Homegrown Animated Shorts is a compilation of 14 short animation films that span across different animation styles, showcasing the creative depth of each of their stories on the big screen.
response.title: MAFF: Homegrown Animated Shorts
